name: Smitten at the Dashing Dalmatian
description:
A short Twine game made for uni coursework last December. The brief was to make a narrative-focused, text-based game, using what Twine has to offer. The game has six possible endings, with varying levels of end-game success.

It's possible I'll come back to this game and rework it, to write more dialogue and add nuance to the conversations, and to flesh out the characters, and perhaps even some audio.

Note: The game is web-based, and sometimes may not work on Google Chrome, unfortunately. If it doesn't, try using Mozilla Firefox instead.
